website_summaries.verdict: Efficient fat separator that uses a fine strainer to prevent small bits of material from remaining in the fluid.
pros: Handle on the side of the cup has a no-slip grip, so you can use it safely
Design includes a tapered lip on the spout to prevent drips
Plastic materials are free of BPA
Separator is easy to clean, as all of the materials are dishwasher safe
Includes clearly visible ounce and milliliter markings on the side of the cup
cons: Spout’s design may cause fat to collect inside it, resulting in unwanted clogs

customer_reviews.title: Tends to drip
customer_reviews.text: Has one of those spouts that you have to pour quickly, otherwise the liquid will run down the outside of the spout! For example, you can NOT pour your liquid slowly while mixing into a roux in your pot. For that alone, this is not worth the price, or really any. 3 stars for the video in the description falsely advertising this as drip-free, when the evidence shows otherwise. This OXO Fat Separator has caused quite a few messes already. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: William Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Handle snapped off
customer_reviews.text: Handle snapped off as I was inserting cork. Really? I'm an average size semi-sedentary older woman.
customer_reviews.author: Together

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 in my kitchen and 1 in R.V. Ordering 2 more, 1 for mom and 1 for mother in law. Work great. Don't be in a hurry, make sure plug is in spout before filling, don't over fill, and let set for a minute or so before removing plug and pouring out. Have used the one in kitchen at least 50 times, and it has been through the dishwasher as many times, with no problems. Took it to moms to make gravy for thanksgiving, and to wifes mom for second thanksgiving. Both want one, as did sister in law, but her husband asked me not to order 1 for her so he could get it as stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Glazebrook

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Large and thick walled so it handled very hot liquid nicely. The filter inset lid catches large bits so you don't have to fish them out of the liquid. The holes are not fine so if you need to remove smaller items like seasonings then you will need to use a sieve once you've removed the fat to get a clearer broth. The rubber stopper really keeps the fat from clogging the spout! One suggestion: I would love to have had a brush to clean the spot included with the separator. I would have paid extra for that!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Boxer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Useless for separating fat.
customer_reviews.text: The product is light weight and is simple to use, but overall I would rate it 1 star because the spout is not suppose to pour out fat, it’s supposed to pour out everything but the fat. Some of the fat immediately went into the spout and when I poured into a sauce pan to make gravy more than half the fat went into the pot. I normally don’t use a separator thought I would try one this year, honestly a waste of money. I can probably use it to strain some things or as a cup. I rated durability as 3 stars because it didn’t feel flimsy bit I didn’t exactly do a durability test on it.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: does what it advertises it separates the fat
customer_reviews.text: the great thing about this is the spout plug. just insert it before you pour in the liquid and then remove it when you need to pour and you will find that it starts from the bottom without the first drop of fat in the spout. the quality al always with oxo is high quality. Here is a company that understands its customers. Produce an exceptional high quality product and people will continue to purchase and trust them. I do not think I have ever had an OXO product that I have not been pleased with. sometimes you do not have to build a better mouse trap , just build a better quality mouse trap.
customer_reviews.author: Skillit Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough... its a standard design ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough...its a standard design that's available and been on the market for decades so nothing really noteworthy in re design and all of that stuff. I will say that it has held up well under top-rack dishwasher cleaning and the plastic is as clear as the day it arrived. Be advised though that the dishwasher will not do much for the spout so you might want to have a small diameter brush on hand to clean the tube. Also - don't lose the stopper or it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Oxo Gravy Separator really works.
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I gave this 4 stars: This holds 4 cups. And the first time I used it, I had about a cup and it did not separate. The second time I used it, I had about 4 cups. I was so surprised and pleased it actually separated the fat from the gravy. If you are going to have less gravy, a smaller size would be better to separate the fat from the gravy. I hand wash most plastics because my dishwasher does not dry plastic items. I have not placed this in the dishwasher so, I can't comment on the durability if placed in dishwasher. It was easy to handwash and dry. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy 9

customer_reviews.title: Great gravy making tool
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Just what I needed. OXO quality I have come to expect. I roast whole chickens in my dutch oven, and needed a quick way to separate the fat from the juices, to make gravy. In the past, I would pour off the drippings, refrigerate and then scrape off the fat. But really wanting to make gravy immediately after roasting, this separator does the trick. I add several ice cubes to cool the drippings (and add a bit of volume), then pour into the separator per instructions. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: catmlb

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Old Days
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a similar looking device that eventually failed due to old age. The stopper for the spout is an amazing improvement on this very old technology. And if you lose the stopper, a wine cork fits perfectly. The stopper / cork keeps fat from entering the spout as you fill the main chamber with broth. Thus you don't pour fat into your "degreased" pot. Clever and cheap - my two favorite things.

I would recommend this product to anyone, the price is right too!

customer_reviews.title: Skim De Fat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and he's vehemently opposed to single use items. Not only did it make the finest of Thanksgiving gravies, we used it to skim the fat from 10 pounds of pork in mere seconds. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for separating broth and fat.
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without this fat separator before?! If you make meat broth or soups or stews or gravies this handy little tool will let you easily separate the liquid and fat. It is a little difficult to clean the spout without some kind of bottle brush and the hard plastic would probably crack if dropped on a hard surface. But these are minor criticisms. I really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: margaret larsen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and the larger size is worth the space
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the small version for years and really like it. The only downside was having to do multiple batches. The big one takes a lot of cabinet space but saves me time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hay

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I found this a long time ago. I used to freeze the au jus to scrape off the frozen grease. This makes french dips from the crock pot so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fat Separator
customer_reviews.text: The Good Grips Fat Separator is great. The handle is thick and padded so it is comfortable to hold, even when the cup is full. I've used very hot liquids in this and the cup has not cracked. I like the 4-cup size for separating fats from broths and soups. The red stopper is supple and easy to insert and remove. It is invaluable for keeping the fat out of the spout. I've used many different fat separators, continously on the look out for the perfect one. This one is it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller might be better?
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, great it can go in the dishwasher. In retrospect, the 2-cup size would have been fine. Now that I have used it a few times it has never been more than half full. The juice in the chicken roaster looks like a lot, but it really isn't as it turns out!
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: If you cook and make gravy - you need this
customer_reviews.text: Was on my friend's list so given to him as a birthday present. He cooks a lot, and absolutely raves about it and loves how it separates the juices and fat.
customer_reviews.author: Danette

customer_reviews.title: What a great gadget! Such a simple design that works so ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great gadget! Such a simple design that works so incredibly well. I make a lot of roasts throughout the year and of course that means gravy too. This separator makes my gravy a bit healthier by keeping out the majority of the fat. The handle on the OXO Good Grips Separator is grippy and very secure and I love the strainer on top. Shipping was quick and the item was well-packed. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent separator that works well and is solid for years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, solid design, and solid materials. Not too much to ask for in a separator, but amazing how so many get the details wrong. I really love how this works, and the holes are just right. Not so small to block good flow, but not so large to allow lots of stuff through. And the stopper is great, nice and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: James Kiffmeyer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This works great when you read the instructions. I forgot the rubber stopper on my first try, but I started over using the stopper with perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: jlbl1950

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfect. A larger size would have made it even ...
customer_reviews.text: It exhibit high quality, and works very well...and, contrary to other reviewers, the size is perfect. A larger size would have made it even more difficult to store away. But, the stopper should be attached as well as removable.
customer_reviews.author: jasmansr

customer_reviews.title: Makes Perfect turkey gravy
customer_reviews.text: This works great! So easy to prepare gravy stock from roast Turkey dinner on Thanksgiving or a Sunday roast beef. Kind of a pain to clean but a baby bottle brush does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: tlbrooks

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. I put it in the fridge to harden up the fat. I like it has a plug
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great job of allowing only the non fat dripping to pour out
customer_reviews.text: Clever gadget! Remember to keep the red plug in while pouring the dripping into the strainer lid. It keeps the first part of the fat from filling into pouring spout of cup as the fat rises to the top. Nice big 2 cup size. Impressed over all and like I said, clever.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: but they look like a good kitchen tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a chef, (my nephew) for wedding gift. When asked which one he wanted, and he could have picked any one on the market, he chose this one. And he is very particular on his cooking tools. I've never used one in my 35 years of cooking and didn't even know these existed, but they look like a good kitchen tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Michelly

customer_reviews.title: Another good OXO product
customer_reviews.text: Like all OXO products I have purchased, a very good product...already had this separator myself and bought this one for my daughter. Works well, durable -- I cook and bake a lot, and OXO is my go-to for kitchenware.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Small, sturdy, effective product. Works well w/ my Instant Pot recipes. I used the extra broth after removing the fat to steam/cook my rice. Yum! : ) I soaked w/ Dawn and put into the DW.
customer_reviews.author: dianelangston

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use handy fat separation tool. It is also well assembled heavy duty and will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 stars because it is hard to clean the spout. I wish they would have included something to help clean it. I gave used my kids straw cleaners to clean them before, but those are skinny and a little flimsy and I need something thicker that can get down the spout and clean the oil. Other than that the product works great at separating, just make sure you have the stopper in first before you pour your juices in or the fat will go I the spout first.
customer_reviews.author: chibbi

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Buy
customer_reviews.text: It does separates most of the oil, but not 100%. The tip is little hard to clean, but overall worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works just as promised
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does what it advertises as advertised. A must have for anyone that uses broth from fatty cooked meats to make soups or sauces.
customer_reviews.author: EastofWest

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cooking
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ! Very healthy way of cooking something with meat and soup. Will recommend to my family and friends. Just the right size. Looks and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Read directions.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure and read directions to put stopper in spout before adding grease drippings to it. I have not had the opportunity to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: While searching for this product I used the term 'glass' in the search. This product came up. I assumed it was made of glass, it was not... Our old (plastic) one eventially cracked from age, making a huge mess, so we looked for a glass one... Oh well. Otherwise this product has worked marvelously. We used it on Thanksgiving several times and it was great. I especially like the small 2-cup size over the huge 4-cup that would take a lot of storage space. OXO makes some good products and this certainly is one of them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Graham

customer_reviews.title: Took a long time with separate the fat
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product, however it didn’t separate the fat as easily as I thought it would. I did have to let it sit for quite a long time, even with the stopper in, before the fat separated.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Hold, Easy to Use, Easy to Store
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. The large size is great for family dinners! There is no issue holding it, storing it, or cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D.

customer_reviews.title: Cut out the fat
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I just wish it came with a cleaning rod for the spout. I just used some wadded up paper tower w soap until the oily stuff was cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Islandwrath

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips 4-Cup Fat Separator
product_meta.description:
Style Name:4 CupCut the fat with the OXO Good Grips 4-Cup Fat Separator. Pour pan juices or stock through the included strainer attachment and watch the fat rise to the top. The BPA-free, heat-resistant strainer catches unwanted bits while the stopper keeps fat from entering the spout. Once the fat and lean juices have fully separated, remove the strainer and the stopper, and pour. The Separator features a comfortable non-slip handle and bold measurement markings for added convenience.

BRAND STORY
By OXO

Strainer catches unwanted bits, stopper prevents fat from entering spout
Tapered lip on spout minimizes drips
Easy-read ounce and milliliter measurement markings
